ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl

Class DefaultValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.ValidationContextImpl
      • ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.DefaultValidation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidationContext, Serializable

    public class DefaultValidation
extends ValidationContextImpl
    A ValidationContext with a default set of rules initially defined. This can be used as-is for a reasonable level of primitive type validation.

    Subclassing this class is discouraged. You should instead subclass NoValidationBuilder and use this to instantiate an instance of ValidationContextImpl.

    Author:
    Bryan Tripp, Christian Ohr
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
